body:
You instill courage in the subject, granting it a +4 morale bonus against fear effects for 10 minutes. If the subject is under the influence of a fear effect when receiving the spell, that effect is suppressed for the duration of the spell.

Remove fear counters and dispels cause fear.
description: Suppresses fear or gives +4 on saves against fear for one subject + one per four levels.
level_text: Bard: 1; Cleric: 1; Inquisitor: 1; Oracle: 1; Shaman: 1; Skald: 1; Warpriest: 1

effects.text: one creature plus one additional creature per four levels, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
effects.name: Targets

name: Remove Fear
